title: A Survey on Deep Neural Network Pruning: Taxonomy Comparison Analysis and Recommendations

sections.description: Introduce the topic of deep neural network pruning, its importance in model compression and optimization, and the scope of the survey.

subsections.subsection title: Significance of Deep Neural Network Pruning
subsections.description: Discuss the importance of pruning in the context of deep neural networks and how it contributes to model efficiency and performance.
Define the boundaries of the survey and what aspects of neural network pruning will be covered.
Outline the organization of the paper to guide the reader through the various sections and topics discussed.

sections.description: Provide an overview of deep neural networks, model compression, and optimization.

subsections.description: Describe the fundamentals of deep neural networks and their role in modern AI.
Explain different techniques for compressing neural network models to improve efficiency.
Define key pruning concepts and their role in enhancing neural network efficiency and performance.

sections.description: Categorize and describe various pruning methods used in deep neural networks.

subsections.description: Discuss structured and unstructured pruning approaches and highlight their unique characteristics and applications.
Explore emerging and innovative pruning techniques.
Examine pruning methods that adapt dynamically to network changes.
Discuss approaches that combine multiple pruning objectives and techniques.

sections.description: Evaluate and compare the effectiveness of different pruning techniques.

subsections.description: Define criteria used to compare pruning methods, such as computational efficiency and accuracy retention.
Discuss key metrics used to assess pruning effectiveness.
Perform a detailed comparison of various pruning methods based on defined criteria.

sections.description: Analyze the impact of pruning on model performance.

subsections.subsection title: Trade-offs Between Model Size and Accuracy
subsections.description: Discuss the balance between reducing model size and maintaining accuracy.

subsections.subsection title: Impact on Computational Efficiency and Resource Utilization
subsections.description: Examine how pruning affects computational resources and network efficiency.

subsections.subsection title: Pruning Techniques and Their Impact on Performance
subsections.description: Analyze how different pruning methods influence overall model performance.
Provide real-world examples and case studies to illustrate pruning impacts.

sections.description: Provide insights and recommendations for optimizing neural networks through pruning.

subsections.subsection title: Best Practices in Neural Network Pruning
subsections.description: Recommend strategies to implement effective pruning in neural networks.
Discuss obstacles and common issues faced during neural network pruning.
Identify ongoing challenges and propose directions for future research.
Explore new trends in pruning and the potential of hybrid models.
Evaluate how knowledge distillation complements pruning techniques.
Discuss the importance of transparency and fairness in applied pruning techniques.

sections.description: Summarize the key findings of the survey and suggest areas for future research.
